name: Cville city
description:
This game is open world. It is one of my bigger projects for javascript. You can get a job, not get a job, do missions and quests that people want, and become popular in the city. Also how you pronounce the game is cville city its (sea-vill  city).

Controls:                          

WASD or arrow keys to move, I recommend sticking to one only instead of switching. Click to shoot. If you have your cursor on the left, it will shoot left, same for the right.
